price: Mo mmͻeε (a edikan yi) anaasε mo sͻreε (wͻ mowuo akyiri no) tesε honam korͻ pεpεεpε. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn Ne Otiefoͻ a Ɔte biribiara, Ohunu (biribiara).
arabic: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā baʿthukum illā kanafsin wāḥidatin inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
